rows.label: tlk45400071_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Just when I was enjoying a nice drink
of Odifa from Cafe Lutino, they had
to come along and spoil the mood.

rows.label: tlk45400071_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You saw them too, right? All
those anti-Blade protesters!

rows.label: tlk45400071_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I mean, sure, Blades are used for
war. But it's not like they're the
ones causing the conflict, are they?

rows.label: tlk45400071_01_msg0004
rows.name:
It's the Invidian government they
should be protesting to. If they
surrender, that'd soon stop the fighting.
